Dark House by – Lensar

Posted on October 1, 2013 by

I’ve decided that there isn’t enough awesome art on this blog. Will there ever be enough, you ask? To that I respond with the resounding certitude, “Never!”

So, there will be more awesomeness every Tuesday now.  Let’s start with something spooky for Halloween.

Enjoy, you lucky darling you.

Picture day: Evgeny Kornienko’s photography

Posted on September 2, 2013 by

Today’s fantastic images come from Evgeny Kornienko, a photographer from Belgorod Russia.  Feast your eyes!  Click for a full view.


   Aren’t those lovely?  You can find more from this photographer at his photodom.com site or his Facebook.  I’d love to tell you something about this artist, but … well, I can’t read Russian and I don’t trust Google Translate.  Still, you know what they say about pictures speaking 1000 words and all.

Are you an artist/photographer/sculptor who loves Steampunk as much as I do?   Would you like to see your work featured on this blog?  Or, do you know of someone else who’s work you adore?  Please leave a comment on this post with a link or two!   I’ll happily feature anything that I think will fit the style of my blog.  And even if I don’t feature it, please please leave your info in a comment anyway!  More art is always better than less.

Posted in Picture Day Tagged art, artwork, Clockwork Twist, Emily Thompson, Evgeny Kornienko, photography, steampunk, victoriana 1 Comment

Picture Day : Insect Lab (Ooo…buy me one!!!)

Posted on August 5, 2013 by

Happy August, internet!  Today’s image dump of awesome comes from Insect Lab Studio, one of the coolest/creepiest sites I’ve found.  These wonderful little sculptures are for sale on the site, so by the time this post is up some of these might already be sold.  Get ‘um while they’re hot!  Enjoy!

  

Are you an artist/photographer/sculptor who loves Steampunk as much as I do?   Would you like to see your work featured on this blog?  Or, do you know of someone else who’s work you adore?  Please leave a comment on this post with a link or two!   I’ll happily feature anything that I think will fit the style of my blog.  And even if I don’t feature it, please please leave your info in a comment anyway!  More art is always better than less.

Posted on July 1, 2013 by

Happy July!  Today’s image dump of awesome is of artworks by “haryarti” from Kazakhstan.  You can find more fantastic artwork at his Deviant Art page.  Enjoy!

Picture Day: Miyumon’s fantastic artwork!

Posted on May 6, 2013 by

It’s the first Monday of the month, and that means it’s time for something pretty.

This month it’s Miyumon, a fantastic artist I found just recently.  Tell me that this first image doesn’t eerily embody the soul of my Twist!  Isn’t it wonderful?

Click on the image to go to her diviantART page.  Below you will find some more delightfuls that I found there.  Go check out all of her work!
